author: draganrakita
content: Order of steps were switched to  make this more obvious: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8790

author: parithosh
content:
Note, we decided on ACD last week that the focus of the next devnet would be 7702 + all existing EIPs in devnet-2. I think most of our testing on devnet-1 has completed, so once 7702 is ready we're ready to launch devnet-3. 

What PRs need to go in before 7702 is considered "ready" for devnet-3?

author: jochembrouwer
content: This is not mentioned explicitly in the EIP, but I assume the designated address pointed to by the 7702'd address should become warm, right?

author: lightclient
content: yes, i will make it explicit in the EIP

author: jochembrouwer
content:
Cool ðŸ˜„

Could you also fix this mini typo? `For example, EXTCODESIZE would return the size of the code pointed to by address instead of 24 which would represent the delegation` (24 -> 23)
